fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Transport
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
The ICEC is a non profit, non political, organisation founded in 1976, aiming at promoting cooperation between national and international cost engineering, quantity surveying and project management organisations worldwide. Region 2 council is in charge for Europe and Middle East. 
The ICEC has been registered as NGO at the  Economic and Social Council of the United Nations.
legal_status: Worldwide confederation of cost engineering, quantity surveying and project management professional societies
position: ICEC Region 2 Director & Delegate for the Italian Association AICE
